body:
Never done one of these before, so why not? I've been playing Minecraft since 2011. I'm currently a High School Senior, and I'm 17. I'm the Co-Leader of Bad Company and I've played with PPB for a couple of Months. I love to make videos https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCkik8rT4_4ltGh-sdPQrnpA/videos, and I have built my own computer. AMA!
P.S. Add me on steam! http://steamcommunity.com/id/NotGurk

title: AMA - NotGurk

replies.body: I never got to really know you that well, for me you were really good quiet player in the back.
replies.body_tagged: I never got to really know you that well, for me you were really good quiet player in the back.

replies.body: Great team, Cyclops is bae, kinda miss it sometimes

replies.body: You guys never responded to my messages over skype when I wanted to trial, even after you had requested me to add you. You guys just kept on ignoring me. That pissed me off to the brim and I still carry a deep hatred for you guys. Happy I joined BC over Apollo

I'm 17

replies.body: Well, you insulted me when I left your team, calling me bad, etc.. even though you desperately wanted me to join before that, also you seem pretty immature. One word to describe you would be Toxic.

replies.body: Definitely the M4A1-S, I never really got the hang of the spray of the M4A4 so.. yeah.

replies.body: Before the update I used the A4 and straight after the update i switched to A1 lmfao. The reason I didn't use it before is because bullets went to fast, now it's so much more controlled.
replies.body_tagged: Before the update I used the A4 and straight after the update i switched to A1 lmfao. The reason I didn't use it before is because bullets went to fast, now it's so much more controlled.

replies.body: At first I thought the a1 was horrible after the update, but I was wrong about it. And yeah, like you said it's better to control it and my ammo clip isn't 3/4 empty after killing 1 or 2 people.

replies.body: I don't recall saying you were bad? I insulted you while you were in the team one time, which I then told you, that I tend to poke fun in a rude way and that if you werent ok with it I would try to not specifcally target you, not when you were out of the team? Also desperate? How so?

Also desperate? How so?
